DOC.brief_title: Myopia Progression After Ceasing Myopia Control Contact Lens Wear
DOC.criteria: 1 . The subject must enrol parent protocol least one year . 2 . The subject 's parent legal guardian must read sign STATEMENT OF INFORMED CONSENT subject must read sign Child 's Assent Form provide copy form . 3 . The subject must appear able willing adhere instruction set forth clinical protocol . 1 . Ocular systemic allergy may interfere contact lens wear . 2 . Systemic disease autoimmune disease use medication ( e.g . antihistamine ) , may interfere contact lens wear . 3 . Clinically significant ( grade 3 4 ) corneal edema , corneal vascularization , corneal stain abnormality cornea , may contraindicate contact lens wear . 4 . Clinically significant ( grade 3 4 ) tarsal abnormality bulbar injection might interfere contact lens wear . 5 . Any ocular infection . 6 . Any corneal distortion result previous hard rigid gas permeable contact lens wear . 7 . Any infectious disease ( e.g . hepatitis , tuberculosis ) immunosuppressive disease ( e.g . HIV ) 8 . Diabetes 9 . Previous refractive surgery , orthokeratology , keratoconus , corneal irregularity either eye . Rigid contact lens wearer enrol study . 10 . Strabismus . 11 . Pupil lid abnormality infection either eye 12 . Central corneal scar either eye 13 . Aphakia either eye 14 . Contraindications contact lens wear dry eye history prior unsuccessful contact lens wear . 15 . History participation prior clinical trial aim control myopia progression , except parent trial 16 . Surgically altered eye , ocular infection type , ocular inflammation . 17 . Anterior chamber angle grade 2 narrow Van Herrick method .
